column1: Smoque BBQ////on to the meat: my brisket was good. I wouldn't say amazing. It had a really good smoked flavor
column2: even without the sauce. The meat was cooked well... but the sauce really added to the flavor. I believe they had a north carolina sauce for the brisket which had a great balance of sweetness but wasn't too tart
column3: and didn't overwhelm the flavor of the brisket. I'd say for me it was more than above average for sure
